author: LDSpits
body:
I would like to be able to extend a program of mine with powershell capabilities. There was an SDK for that available in older versions of PowerShell. I have looked for a new version for core hut haven't found any. 

Is there a Powershell SDK available? Or was support for it dropped with 6.0?
title: Is there a Powershell SDK for powershell 6.0 core?
